1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 import rospy
3 import serial
4 import struct
5 from drone.msg import Powers
6 
7 
8 arduino = serial.Serial('/dev/ttyUSB0', 9600, bytesize=serial.EIGHTBITS, timeout=1)
9 serial_frame = {
10  "header": 0x55,
11  "len": 8,
12  "data": [0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0],
13  "crc": 0
14 }
15 
16 rospy.init_node("arduino_serial")
17 subscriber = rospy.Subscriber("control_data", Powers, callback)
18 
19 def callback(msg):
20  serial_frame["data"][0] = msg.left_alt_power
21  serial_frame["data"][1] = msg.right_alt_power
22  serial_frame["data"][2] = msg.left_heading_power
23  serial_frame["data"][3] = msg.right_heading_power
24  serial_frame["data"][4] = msg.back_alt_power
25  serial_frame["data"][5] = msg.light_mode
26  serial_frame["data"][6] = int(msg.lock)
27 
28  serial_frame["crc"] = 0
29  for i in range(serial_frame["len"]):
30  serial_frame["crc"] = serial_frame["crc"] ^ (int(serial_frame["data"][i]) & 0b11111111)
31 
32  packet = struct.pack(
33  "2B5b4B",
34  self.serial_frame["header"],
35  self.serial_frame["len"],
36  self.serial_frame["data"][0],
37  self.serial_frame["data"][1],
38  self.serial_frame["data"][2],
39  self.serial_frame["data"][3],
40  self.serial_frame["data"][4],
41  self.serial_frame["data"][5],
42  self.serial_frame["data"][6],
43  self.serial_frame["data"][7],
44  self.serial_frame["crc"]
45  )
46 
47  arduino.write(packet)
